text: Bitterwater Valley is a valley in San Benito County, California. Its mouth is located at an elevation of 971 feet / 296 meters near the confluence of Bitterwater Creek with Lewis Creek a tributary to San Lorenzo Creek, a tributary of the Salinas River. Its head is at 1630 feet / 538 meters, at . == References == Category:Valleys of San Benito County, California
title: Bitterwater Valley
